articles.title: Trump seizes control of D.C. police and deploys National Guard
articles.description: President Trump has taken control of the D.C. police and deployed National Guard troops, leading to warnings from mayors about potential power grabs.

articles.title: Shooter kills 3 in a Target parking lot in Austin, Texas, before being captured, police say
articles.description: A shooting at a Target store in Austin, Texas, resulted in three fatalities. The suspect is in custody.

articles.title: Israel intensifies bombing of Gaza killing 89 within 24 hours
articles.description: Israel has intensified its bombing campaign in Gaza, resulting in 89 deaths within a 24-hour period.
